info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:24AM EDT until June 16 at 4:45AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BAY AND NORTHEASTERN SAGINAW COUNTIES... At 423 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kawkawlin to near Munger to near Bridgeport, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Bay and northeastern Saginaw Counties, including the following locations... Shiawassee National Wildlife Refuge, Carrollton, Arthur, Buena Vista Township, Gera, Bay City State Recreation Area and Indiantown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
